tool_description: Modifies existing diagnostic imaging appointments including rescheduling, updating details, or changing assigned resources.

appointment_id.description: Unique identifier for the appointment to be modified

error_messages: Appointment not found: The specified appointment_id does not exist.
Invalid new time: New appointment time must be in the future and during operating hours.
Resource unavailable: The new staff member or equipment is not available at the requested time.
Invalid duration: New duration must be between 15 and 180 minutes.
Invalid priority level: Use one of [routine, urgent, emergency].
Modification not allowed: Appointment cannot be modified due to its current status.
Scheduling conflict: The new time conflicts with existing appointments or maintenance.
Missing modification reason: A reason for the modification must be provided.
usage: Provide appointment_id and modification_reason, along with any parameters you want to change, to update an existing appointment.

modification_successful.description: Whether the modification was completed successfully

updated_appointment_details.description: Summary of the updated appointment information

confirmation_number.description: New confirmation number for the modified appointment

notification_sent.description: Whether notification of changes was sent to the pet owner
